text: Anthony McGill is an American clarinetist. He is the principal clarinetist for the Metropolitan Opera. == Early life and education == McGill grew up in Chicago, Illinois. He went to the Curtis Institute of Music in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He teaches at the Peabody Institute at Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, Maryland. == Career == Together with Itzhak Perlman (violin), Yo-Yo Ma (cello), and Gabriela Montero (piano), he recorded and performed "Air and Simple Gifts" by John Williams, for Barack Obama's inauguration ceremony on January 20, 2009.https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp- dyn/content/article/2008/12/17/AR2008121702419.html ==References== ==Other websites== * Anthony McGill biography at the Peabody Institute * Category:American clarinetists Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Living people Category:1979 births Category:20th-century American musicians Category:21st-century American musicians Category:African-American musicians Category:Johns Hopkins University faculty
title: Anthony McGill
